You and your partner, if you have one, just got a job in Canterbury. Now where to live?
This application color codes Canterbury's rental areas by their affordability to you. Here affordability is based on rent, commute, parking, and car ownership cost estimates determined by your answers to the questions below.

  1. What will your combined net annual incomes be?
    Median gross annual income of
    employed Canterburians ($44,876)
  2. How many bedrooms will your dwelling have?
    • 1
    • 2
    • 3
    • 4
  3. For how many of these bedrooms will you pay rent?
    • 1
    • 2
    • 3
    • 4
  4. Where will you work? Move the map markers.
  5. How will you commute?
    • You
    • Partner
  6. How will you cost your commute time per hour?
    You
    Partner
  7. How many days per week will you commute?
    You
    Partner
  8. How much will commute parking cost per day?
    You
    Partner
  9. How many cars will you own?
    • 0
    • 1
    • 2
    • 3

Hint: To ignore your partner, cast their map marker out to sea or zero their commute days.
